Class Field

public class Field
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    BoardHandler getBoard()
    gets the board the field is on
    GameCharacter getStanding()
    gets the character currently standing on the field
    boolean isPopulated()
    returns if there is a character standing on the field
    void setStanding​(GameCharacter standing)
    sets the character standing on the field
    void unsetStanding()
    removes the character which is currently standing on the field from the field

      returns if there is a character standing on the field

      public void setStanding​(GameCharacter standing) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
      sets the character standing on the field
      Parameters:
      standing - GameCharacter standing on the field
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - when field is already populated

    • unsetStanding

      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the field is not populated
